import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List part suppliers"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/suppliers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of part suppliers for procurement and inventory workflows. Use this to browse suppliers before attaching them to parts or purchase orders.

**Workflow Example**
1. [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers](/docs/api/parts/list-part-suppliers) to load the supplier list.
2. Use returned `Items[].PartSupplierId` to fetch details via [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/\{PartSupplierId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-supplier-by-id).
3. Create new suppliers with [POST /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/new](/docs/api/parts/create-part-supplier) as needed.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
